1 SKY.name: 1 Sky
1 SKY.remarks: Near the Sunshine Square and Queensbay mall, Few mins drive to Penang Bridge and the Penang International Airport

118 @ Island Plaza.name: 118 @ ISLAND PLAZA
118 @ Island Plaza.remarks: Formerly Island Plaza office building. Bus stop, supermarket, shopping mall, restaurants and hawker center are within walking distance

BAYSWATER.name: BAYSWATER
BAYSWATER.remarks: Located next to Tesco and E-Gate Complex, only 3-mins drive to Penang Bridge

BELLISA COURT.name: BELLISA COURT
BELLISA COURT.remarks: Morning market, banks, post office, hawker center, Gurney Plaza and Gurney Paragon are within walking distance

BIRCH REGENCY @ PENANG TIMES SQUARE.name: BIRCH REGENCY @ PENANG TIMES SQUARE
BIRCH REGENCY @ PENANG TIMES SQUARE.remarks: Food court and McDonalds are right below the condominium

COASTAL TOWER.name: COASTAL TOWER
COASTAL TOWER.remarks: 10 ~15 mins drive to shopping center, restaurants, banks and Gurney area; some units can enjoy great sea view from balconies
